channel.description: Recent content in Pages on tek256

item.title: Tutoring
item.description: Looking to get started in C? Maybe you want to learn programming from nothing! I offer tutoring & mentoring services open to everyone! Tutoring Here are the languages I can help teach: C C++ Java C# PHP HTML / CSS / Javascript As well I can help tutor in Computer Science theory & fundamentals! Mentoring Mentoring is long form communication where I help guide & answer questions over email.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: Question Index: How old are you? Where are you from? Are you going to school for Computer Science? What’s your day job? What languages do you know? What OS do you use? What’s your computer build? What keyboard do you use? What languages do you use for Game Development? Why C? How did you learn to write code?
